text: - Hello, I'm Ian Hutchinson.
I'm the Global AWS Lead at SoftwareONE.
So SoftwareONE is a global IT services
and licensing provider.
We provide software and cloud services
to all of our customers globally.

So AWS is a market leader
in the cloud space,

and our strategy is to
help customers adopt

and gain the most value
from cloud services.
So the launch of the AWS Swiss region
is really important
for our customers and SoftwareONE.
Our customers want to have data urgency
and data privacy in their own locations
for compliance and legal reasons,
and this allows them to do that.
It's very common

with our other customers
in all of our regions.
One of my highlights as a global lead

is to see the enthusiasm
and passion of our software

one people engaging and
working collaboratively
with AWS in all of our regions,
and it makes me proud.
